name: Northstar Golf Course
description: The Northstar California™ Resort golf course is an 18-hole, par-72 (men and women) course that makes every guest feel welcome. From beautiful scenic views to two unique nines, Northstar™ Resort’s pro-rated golf course maintains a comfortable feeling that will challenge golfers’ skills and appeal to their senses. The 18-hole golf course was designed by Robert Muir Graves, legendary landscape architect. His designs are notorious for integrating rugged, wooded sites with wavy bunkers and putting surfaces. The result of a Graves creation is a very active looking course. His unique features create a flow of movement in the land, qualities golfers will experience while playing at Northstar Resort. The course plays up to 6,820 yards. Our course offers 5 tee locations and carries a rating of 73. Northstar Resort offers helpful pin placement sheets and a guide to every hole on the scorecard. It’s the perfect spot for a group outing with the meadow nine being very playable and the mountain nine (back nine) yielding a challenge for all levels.

faqs.question: What’s included in Northstar golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, tee times, carts, and concierge planning. Transportation, dining, and add-ons available for groups.

faqs.question: How much do Northstar packages cost?
faqs.answer: Typical packages range $299–$499 per golfer depending on season, lodging, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you handle tournaments and corporate groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—tee sheets, room blocks, banquets, and full concierge planning for groups of all sizes.

bodyText: Play Northstar in Truckee with golf groups, tee times, and stay and play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure trips.

Lake Tahoe’s Most Unique Mountain Layout
The Northstar California™ Resort golf course is an 18-hole, par-72 (men and women) course that makes every guest feel welcome. From beautiful scenic views to two unique nines, Northstar™ Resort’s pro-rated golf course maintains a comfortable feeling that will challenge golfers’ skills and appeal to their senses. The 18-hole golf course was designed by Robert Muir Graves, legendary landscape architect. His designs are notorious for integrating rugged, wooded sites with wavy bunkers and putting surfaces. The result of a Graves creation is a very active looking course. His unique features create a flow of movement in the land, qualities golfers will experience while playing at Northstar Resort. The course plays up to 6,820 yards. Our course offers 5 tee locations and carries a rating of 73. Northstar Resort offers helpful pin placement sheets and a guide to every hole on the scorecard. It’s the perfect spot for a group outing with the meadow nine being very playable and the mountain nine (back nine) yielding a challenge for all levels.

Truckee, CA
168 Basque Dr, Truckee, CA 96161
15 Minutes from Carson City, NV
25 Minutes from Peppermill and Atlantis
29 Minutes from Downtown Reno
30 Minutes from Minden, NV
42 Minutes from Stateline, NV
57 Minutes from Truckee, CA
107 Minutes from Graeagle, CA

Northstar Golf Course is part of
Northstar California Resort in Truckee, California
, just minutes from Lake Tahoe.

The 18-hole course was designed by
Robert Muir Graves
, known for creating layouts that integrate natural wooded terrain with flowing bunkers and greens.

The course features two distinct nines: the
Meadow Nine
, a welcoming, more playable layout, and the
Mountain Nine
, which adds elevation and challenge for golfers of all levels.

Golfers enjoy a
driving range, chipping and sand practice areas, expansive putting green, golf shop, and grab & go dining
, plus scorecards with hole-by-hole guides.

Yes. The
Meadow Nine
is ideal for newcomers, while the
Mountain Nine
offers challenge for experienced players, making it enjoyable for all skill levels.

Yes. Golf the High Sierra offers
custom stay-and-play packages
at Northstar Golf Course, perfect for leisure travelers, groups, and corporate outings.
Request your package here »

tips.title: Golf The High Sierra
tips.content: Book your next group golf trip with us!

pointOfView: THE LINKS WITH A LANDSCAPE – 18 holes, 6,781 yards, 4 tee locations, and a 72.4 NCGA rating – all up at 6,000 feet, allowing you to hit the ball 10-15 yards farther than normal (not bad, right?). Get ready to grip it and rip it on the open, links-style front Meadow Nine, and then dial things in on the tree-lined fairways and small greens of the famous back Mountain Nine.
distances: 60 minutes from South Lake Tahoe (50 miles)
contentParagraphs: Play Northstar in Truckee with golf groups, tee times, and stay and play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure trips.
Get ready to grip it and rip it on the open, links-style front “Meadow Nine,” and then dial things in on the tree-lined fairways and small greens of the famous back “Mountain Nine.”
Hours of Operation: 7 a.m. - 6 p.m. Breakfast Grab and Go 7 a.m. - 10 a.m. Lunch Grab and Go 10 a.m. - 6 p.m..
Reservations can be made up to 1 year in advance. Shotgun groups can be accommodated with larger groups. Rates tier throughout the day, discounted rates available mid-week.
Northstar Golf Course is part of Northstar California Resort in Truckee, California , just minutes from Lake Tahoe.

featuredHole.title: Hole #10 — Par 3
featuredHole.description: Classic mountain finishing hole set among the granite boulders and lodgepole pines of the Northstar resort. The approach features a dramatic uphill shot to a well-bunkered green with the ski mountain as a backdrop.

testimonials.quote: Northstar Golf Course delivers every time. This was our third trip and the course keeps getting better. Par 3s are memorable, greens are quick and true. Best value for championship golf in the Truckee, CA area.
testimonials.author: Sharon W.

testimonials.quote: First time playing Northstar Golf Course and it exceeded every expectation. The scenery alone is worth the trip, but the course layout is genuinely challenging and fair. Our whole group wants to come back.
testimonials.author: Angela S.

testimonials.quote: We've done golf trips all over the West, and Northstar Golf Course is now a permanent stop. The condition was pristine, greens rolled true, and the mountain views are unmatched. GTHS set up our tee times perfectly.
testimonials.author: Sandy P.
